simplified_text:
I think this kind of thinking explains why I don’t use Facebook. I’ve never signed up for it, and sure, I’ve probably missed some small perks that come with it. But honestly, it hasn’t really hurt my efforts to have a fun and fulfilling social life at all. 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The author explains why they don’t use Facebook, noting they’ve missed some benefits but still enjoy a great social life.

content:
I think this kind of thinking explains why I don’t use Facebook. I’ve never signed up for it, and sure, I’ve probably missed some small perks that come with it. But honestly, it hasn’t really hurt my efforts to have a fun and fulfilling social life at all. 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The author explains why they don’t use Facebook, noting they’ve missed some benefits but still enjoy a great social life.
